The hiss Module¶

Target¶

class hiss.target.Target(target_url='', **kwargs)¶

Create a new target for notifications.

Targets are specified using a URL like string of the form

scheme://[usernane[:password]@]host:port

where scheme is currently one of snp or gntp.

All values can be overridden using named parameters.

Notification¶

class hiss.notifier.Notification(title='', text='', icon='', sound='', enabled=True, priority=0, timeout=-1, app_sig='')¶

Create a new notification

Parameters:
  • title (string) – Notification title.
  • text (string) – The text to display below the title
  • icon (string or None for no icon) – Icon to display
  • priority (integer) –

    Notification display priority. Default priority = Normal

    Value Priority Type
    -2 Very Low
    -1 Moderate
    0 Normal
    1 High
    2 Emergency
  • signature (string) –

    MIME style application signature to use for this notification.

    Notifications created by a Notifier have this information filled in automatically.
add_action(command, label)¶

Add an action to this notification.

Multiple actions can be added.

Parameters:
  • command (string) – The command to execute
  • label (string) – The label to display
add_callback(command, label='')¶

Add a callback for this notification.

Only 1 callback can be added. Calling this multiple times will only use the last.

hide()¶

Hide the notification

isvisible¶

Determine if the notification is currently being displayed.

show()¶

Show the notification.

text¶

The text displayed below the title encoded as UTF-8.

title¶

The title of the displayed notification encoded as UTF-8.

update()¶

Update the title and text of an existing notification.

Notifier¶

class hiss.notifier.Notifier(signature, name, icon=None, uid=None)¶

Create a new notifier

Parameters:
  • signature (string) – The MIME style application signature for this notifier of the form application/x-vnd.vendor.app
  • name (string) – The name of this notifier
  • icon – Notifier icon. Used when registering the notifier and the default icon for notifications (unless overridden.)
  • uid – Unique id to use for this notifier. If not specified a new id will be generated
add_target(target)¶

Add a target to the list of known targets

Parameters:target (hiss.Target) – The Target to add.
create_notification(class_id=-1, name='', title=None, text=None, icon=None, sound=None)¶

Create a notification that is ready to send.

Parameters:
  • class_id (integer) – The notification class id
  • name (string) – The notification name
  • title (string or None to use registered title) – The title of the notification
  • text (string or None to use registered text) – The text to display in the notification
  • icon (string or None to use registered icon) – URL of icon to display
  • sound (string or None to use registered sound) – Sound to play when showing notification
notify(notification, target=None)¶

Send a notification to a specific target or all targets.

Parameters:
  • notification (hiss.Notification) – The notification to send
  • target (hiss.Target or None) – The target to send the notification to. If no target is specified then the notification will be sent to all known targets.
register(targets=None)¶

Register this notifier with all targets

Parameters:targets (hiss.Target or None) – The targets to register with (Optional) If not specified or None then the notifier will be registered with all known targets
register_notification(name, default_title='', default_text=None, default_icon=None, default_sound=None, enabled=True)¶

Add a notification class.

Parameters:
  • name (string) – Notification class name
  • default_title (string) – Default notification title (Optional)
  • default_text (string) – Default notification text (Optional)
  • default_icon (string) – Default notification icon (Optional)
  • default_sound (string) – Default notification sound (Optional)
  • enabled (boolean) – Whether notification is enabled (Optional)
remove_target(target)¶

Remove a previously added target.

Parameters:target (hiss.Target) – The Target to add.
subscribe(signatures=[], targets=None)¶

Subscribe to notifications from a list of signatures.

Parameters:signatures (List or an empty list. I an empty list specified then subscribe to all applications.) – List of signatures to listen to events from.
unregister(targets=None)¶

Unregister this notifier with all targets

Parameters:targets (hiss.Target or None) – The targets to register with If not specified or None then the notifier will be registered with all known targets

class hiss.resource.Icon(uri='', data=None)¶
